sentences: See purunes tükkideks kui ta selle maha põrkas.
Puidust tool läks tükkideks, kui keegi sellele peale istus.
context: The word 'tükkideks' in Estonian means to break something into multiple pieces. It is often used when describing the shattering of an object or its complete fragmentation. It implies a forceful breaking apart, resulting in smaller, separate parts.
